name: Emu Rush
description:
Emu Rush is a sub par top down 2D shooter set in an alternate timeline of the 1932 Great Emu War where there is active conflict between the Human (who have weaponized Robo Emus)  and the Emu resistance.

  • Sub par gameplay and graphics!
  • One short level!
  • Far too challenging combat!

The goal is to defeat the Generals Emu Bots army and reach the end goal to finally bring down the General...and his wife...for unrelated reasons (or so I'm told)

Controls

Keyboard

  • W - Move upwards
  • A - Move left
  • S - Move down
  • D - Move right

Mouse

  • Left Mouse - Fire weapon
  • Cursor movement - Aiming/Looking
